titleStmt.title: A new booke, intituled, I am for you all, complexions castle as well in the time of the pestilence, as other times, out of the which you may learne your complexion, your disease incident to the same, and the remedies for the same. Published by Iames Manning, minister of the word.
I am for you all, complexions castle
titleStmt.author: Manning, James, minister at Wellingborough.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1604. And are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard [, London] by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: I am for you all, complexions castle.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard [
